definition: to be amazed/to be surprised/to wonder
to startle/to be frightened/to be scared/alarm
to slap the table in amazement (idiom); wonderful!/amazing!
Slapping the Table in Amazement (Part II), second of two books of vernacular stories by Ming dynasty novelist Ling Mengchu 凌濛初|凌蒙初[Ling2 Meng2 chu1]
pinyin: Er4 ke4 Pai1 an4 Jing1 qi2

definition: Slapping the Table in Amazement (Part I), first of two books of vernacular stories by Ming dynasty novelist Ling Mengchu 凌濛初|凌蒙初[Ling2 Meng2 chu1]
pinyin: Chu1 ke4 Pai1 an4 Jing1 qi2

sentences.english: One Wow to the good life.
sentences.chinese: 一個能讓人過上幸福生活的令人驚奇的訣竅。

sentences.english: Surprise nailed me to the spot.
To my amazement, he was able to recite the poem from memory.
sentences.chinese: 令我大爲驚奇的是，他把這首詩從頭到尾背了出來。

sentences.english: Genuine literature is but a sense of wonder at the universe and at human life.
sentences.chinese: 真正之文學不外是一種對宇宙及人生之驚奇感覺。

sentences.english: He turns you adrift on the world with surprising alacrity.
sentences.chinese: 他以令人驚奇的喜愛任你在世上漂泊。

sentences.english: Life can be messy and confusing, but it's also full of surprises.
sentences.chinese: 生活有時亂如麻，讓人困惑，但有時也充滿驚奇。

sentences.english: He says if you could stand on the Moon and watch the total lunar eclipse, the view would be even more dramatic.
sentences.chinese: 如果能在月亮上看月全食，場景會更令人驚奇。

sentences.english: You will surprise everyone with your no nonsense approach to life and everything you do.
sentences.chinese: 你對生活和工作雷厲風行的態度讓每個人都感到驚奇。

sentences.english: The colours in the markets around Durbar Square are wonderful.
sentences.chinese: 顏色在謁見室廣場附近的市場中是令人驚奇的。

sentences.english: Suprised at the fact that so many kinds of books are published in our country.
sentences.chinese: 驚奇的是發現我們國家竟然出版了這麼多種的書籍。

sentences.english: Lu AI Gong more surprised, how can such a thing?
sentences.chinese: 魯哀公更加驚奇了，怎麼會有這種事兒呢？

sentences.english: It was amazing that the boy was able to solve the problem so quickly.
sentences.chinese: 那男孩能這樣快地解完這道題，真是令人驚奇。

sentences.english: They walked into Dingling and were surprised at the wonders.
sentences.chinese: 他們走進定陵，對那裏的奇觀感到很驚奇。

definition: to exclaim in admiration/a gasp of surprise
to be startled/to be shocked/to be amazed
to cry out in alarm or surprise
to move emotionally/to stir up (emotions)/to excite
to be surprised/to be amazed/to be stunned
